text: (nabiye!) oba veta mage vahalun ma gæna vimasuvahot (eyata oba mese kiyanu): “niyata vasayenma ma samipayehima sitinnemi. (kavurun ho) mava aradhana kalahot ema aradhana karannange aradhanavata ma pilituru dennemi”. ebævin ovun ma vetama prarthana kala yutuya. mava visvasa kala yutuya. (emagin) ovun rju margaya at kara gannaha
